hint.text: Sum of exterior angles of a polygon taken in order is \(360^o\)

solution.text:
Let number of sides be n.
The interior angle and the exterior angle together form a linear pair
Hence, Exterior angle\( =180- \)Interior angle\( =180-_{j}_=_{{180-j}}_\)
Thus each exterior angle of the polygon is _{{180-j}}_
Now, we know that sum of exterior angles of a polygon is \(360^o\), hence
Number of sides\( \times \)Exterior angle\(=360\)
\(n \times _{{180-j}}_=360\)
\(n=360/_{{180-j}}_ = _{{360/(180-j)}}_\)

content.text: Each interior angle of a polygon is \(_{j}_^o\). Find the number of sides of the polygon
